description: Contains the sequence of events for the transport request.

columns.name: TXPORT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transport request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EVENT_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the assignment status of the transport request was updated on the server, stored as UTC. For local time, use TXPORT_EVENTS.EVENT_INSTANT_LOCAL_DTTM.

columns.name: WORKER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transporter assigned to this transport request at the time of the status update.

columns.name: TXPORT_DLY_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The delay reason category number if the transport request was marked as delayed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TXPORT_CANC_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains cancel reasons specified by the user if the transport request was canceled.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HKR_TXPORT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the transporter who changes the status of the request.

columns.name: EMP_TXPORT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who changes the status of the request.

columns.name: EVENT_INSTANT_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The local instant at which the assignment status of the transport request was updated. For UTC, use TXPORT_EVENTS.EVENT_INSTANT_DTTM.

columns.name: ENTRY_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which an update to the assignment status of the transport request was entered, stored as UTC.
